game is good when smurfs and hackers aren't in every single match, even with prime. Shame you have to sepnd money on an exterior anticheat platform to ensure you don't get rage hacked every match. 20 years is ample time to develop a working anticheat.

Nobody can argue that this is a game that has stood the test of time and never gets old.
The game is one of the best on the First person shooter market
Valve team is working hard to improve the game everyday! Fixing issues and improving the quality of gameplay.

cs永远是最硬核的竞技射击游戏，可能你会被挂打崩心态，但是当你想找一款游戏代替它的时候你就会发现——cod真香！

NAZI NAZARET SIGANME EN TWITCH ndeah

This game used to be so much fun. But now the new ranking system is so broken, the game feels like way too much of a grind. Easy to derank, really difficult to rank up. That and there are way to many cheaters since it's gone f2p, not to mention the exploits that are in the code of the game that are not VACable. CSGO is in a sad state right now and headed the same direction as TF2. Damn shame that I have to give this game a bad review after years of playing it, but at this time, I cannot recommend this game.
